mapper.insert: insert into userfile (id, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id, score, file, filetype_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filetypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update userfile set state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditTime = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applyTime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor_id = #{auditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, applier_id = #{applierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, score = #{score,jdbcType=TINYINT}, file = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filetype_id = #{filetypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id, score, file, filetype_id from userfile where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id, score, file, filetype_id from userfile
